controller
Interface Controller

public interface Controller

A simple interface for a TTT controller. Keeps track of which views are playing the game as well as the models they have in use. Passes requests from the views to the model and results back to the views.

Version:
0.0 pending CCR approval
Author:
Benjamin Pellittieri and Christopher Pauliks for Mustache Cash Stash

Method Detail

requestMove

boolean requestMove(int xPosition,
                    int yPosition,
                    PlaceValue pieceToPlace)
A request from a client to place a piece on the Gameboard at a certain position. The controller passes this request to the Gameboard

Parameters:
xPosition - The x (horizontal) coordinate of the requested space to occupy
yPosition - The y (vertical) coordinate of the requested space to occupy
pieceToPlace - The type of piece to put in the requested location.
Returns:
Whether the move request was successful in updating the Gameboard.

isClientsTurn

boolean isClientsTurn(Client thisClient)
Allows a Client to ask whether it is their turn.

Parameters:
thisClient - The Client asking the question.
Returns:
true if it is this Client's turn, else false.

newGame

void newGame(Client xPlayer,
             Client oPlayer)
Begins a new game with the given clients.

Parameters:
xPlayer - The player controlling X pieces
oPlayer - The player controlling O pieces

resign

boolean resign(Client resigningClient)
Allows a Client to request to forfeit the current game.

Parameters:
resigningClient - The Client requesting to forfeit the game.
Returns:
Whether the request to resign was successful.

endSession

void endSession(Client quittingClient)
Requests to quit the game entirely. This should also forfeit the current game (if any).

Parameters:
quittingClient - The client requesting to end the game.

getGameboardState

Gameboard getGameboardState()
Allows a client to request a copy of the Gameboard This request should be passed to the Gameboard

Returns:
A copy of the Gameboard

getStatisticsState

Statistics getStatisticsState()
Allows a client to request a copy of the Statistics This request should be passed to the Statistics

Returns:
A copy of the Statistics
